Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is accessible almost every time. It can also provide a more accurate feedback when tutors have different opinions in a certain topic

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI helps me more in understanding things, tutors help me in answering future questions
